content:
The Sony WH-1000XM4 is a fantastic choice! Those headphones are highly regarded for their excellent noise-cancelling performance and sound quality. The noise-cancelling technology in those headphones is some of the best in the market, and it's great to hear that it's making a big difference for you during your daily commute.

The WH-1000XM4 is also known for its comfortable design and long battery life, making it perfect for extended listening sessions. And with features like quick charging and customizable noise-cancelling modes, it's a very versatile headphone.

It's great that you're enjoying your listening experience with those headphones. Music and podcasts can really make a commute more enjoyable, and with the WH-1000XM4, you can fully immerse yourself in the sound.

By the way, have you tried out any of the advanced features like Adaptive Sound Control or the Quick Attention mode? Those features can further enhance your listening experience and provide more convenience during your commute.

Also, what kind of music or podcasts do you usually listen to during your commute? I'm curious!
